intro: Aneilema stenothyrsum, commonly known as the narrow-leaved aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Its leaves are narrow and often have a slightly hairy texture. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in moist forest understories.
